description: Baseline transformation, which is applied to raw input data
units_description: The base LURF can be set here and in the baseline config, as well as other adjustments to the baseline.

description: Reduce :math:`\text{CH}_4` emissions from rice production by 45% due to improved management and reduced flooding.
units_description: Fractional reduction in methane emitted from rice production

transformer: AGRC: Decrease demand for unhealthy crops
description: Reduction in demand for specified crops; the default is sugarcane.
units_description: Fractional reduction for specified crops

description: Decrease agricultural exports by 50% (relative to final time period)
units_description: Fractional reduction in agricultural exports

description: Reduce waste food waste in the agricultural (crop) supply chain (pre-consumer)
units_description: Fractional reduction in food waste in supply chain

description:
| Decrease soil organic carbon loss in croplands and leave crop residues (reduce fraction removed and burned)
 | 
 | **Croplands**: Increases :math:`F_{MG}` for ``croplands`` to 1.067 (see V4, Chapter 5, Table 5.5 [2019R] for croplands management factors :math:`F_{MG}` under different management regimes--mean of *No-Till*)
units_description: Fraction of crop classes that adopt conservation agriculture (per crop specified)

description: Increase crop yield factors by 20%
units_description: Fractional increase in crop productivity (mass/area)

description: Unlike conservation agriculture, remove residues from croplands. However, does not coincide with no till agriciulture.
units_description: Fractional of residues removed from crop fields (can conflict with conservation agriculture)

description: Increase annual sequestration in forests
units_description: Fractional increase in sequestration. Negative numbers can be used to reduce it.

description: Land use classes are estimated using a transition matrix and ajdusted using a quadratic program. This transformation can be used to set upper and lower bounds on transitionable land use classes. This transformation can be used to represent the addition of protected areas through the use of a minimum bound OR the prevention of additional growth through the maxium bound.
units_description: Areas of land to bound by class (in variable "Maximum Area" and "Minimum Area" units)

description: Halt deforestation of primary and secondary forests
units_description: Target transition probability for forest classes remaining that class (closer to 1 means less loss)

transformer: LNDU: Decrease loss of land use classes
description: Halt loss of a specified land use class; similarly to DEC_DEFORESTATION, it increases the probability of a class transitioning into itself. The DEC_DEFORESTATION transformer, however, prevents multiple classes from transitioning out.
units_description: Target transition probability for land use class remaining that class (closer to 1 means less loss)

description:
| Decrease soil organic carbon loss in grasslands through sustainable grazing practices
 | 
 | **Grasslands**: Increase :math:`F_{MG}` for ``grasslands`` to 1.157 (see V4, Chapter 6, Table 6.2 [2019R] for grasslands management factors :math:`F_{MG}` under different management regimes--mean of *Improved Grassland*)
units_description: Fractions of pastures use sustainable grazing

description: Missing
units_description: Fraction of specified land use classes (e.g., grasslands) with rehabilitiation, minimizing SOC loss

description: Increases probability of input land use classes being converted to secondary forests. This transformation can be defined for specific land use classes--e.g., converting only shrublands and croplands to
units_description: Target fractional increase in forest area

description: Increase the use of silvopasture by increaasing the average sequestration factor associated with pastures. This transformer models silvopasture as a fraction of pastures with planted forests. Since the magnitude is a fraction of area, the average sequestration factor is estimated as m*f, where m is the magnitude (prevalence) and f is the secondary forest sequestration factor.
units_description: Fraction of pasture under silvopasture. Applies secondary forest carbon sequestration factors to silvopasture area.

description: Set land use reallocation factor to 0.5
units_description: Reallocation factor, which ranges from 0 to 1, represents the responsiveness of land use to external agriculture demands (crops and livestock). A value of 1 is completely responsive (total market power) which a value of 0 is completely unresponsive (e.g., centrally planned land use).

transformer: LSMM: Increase biogas capture at anaerobic decomposition facilities
description: Increase the fraction of biogas that is captured at manure treated at anaerobic livestock manure treatment facilities
units_description: Target minimum fraction of biogas that is captured from manure management facilities with anaerobic decomposition (including lagoons)

transformer: LSMM: Improve manure management for cattle and pigs
description:
| 95% of manure from cattle (dairy and non-dairy) and pigs is treated. Under default conditions, the manure treated is sent to the following pathways:
 |    37.5% to Anaerobic Digestion
 |    12.5% to Composting
 |    25.0% to Daily Spread
 |    12.5% to Deep Bedding
 |    12.5% to Solid Storage
units_description: Fractions of cattle and pig manure managed by each LSMM management pathway. Can specify any target pathway.

transformer: LSMM: Improve manure management for other animals
description:
| 95% of manure from all other animals is treated. The manure treated is sent to the following pathways:
 |    37.5.% to Composting
 |    12.5% to Dry Lot
 |    25.0% to Daily Spread
 |    25.0% to Solid Storage
units_description: Fractions of non cattle, pig, or poultry manure managed by each LSMM management pathway. Can specify any target pathway.

transformer: LSMM: Improve manure management for poultry
description:
| 95% of manure from poultry (chickens) and pigs is treated. The manure treated is sent to the following pathways:
 |    100% to Poultry Management
units_description: Fractions of poultry manure managed by each LSMM management pathway. Can specify any target pathway.

description: Reduce enteric fermentation
units_description: Fractional reduction in enteric fermentation across all classes

description: Decrease exports of livestock and livestock products by 50% (relative to final time period)
units_description: Fractional reduction in livestock exports

description: Increase inferred livestock carrying capacity by 20%
units_description: Fractional increase in livestock productivity

description: Decrease lime applied to soils (default 5%)
units_description: Fractional decrease in lime applied to soils

description: Decrease total nitrogen applied  through more precise fertilizer use (default 5%)
units_description: Fractional decrease in fertilizer N applied to soils

description: Missing
units_description: Minimum target fraction of anaerobic wastewater treatment facilties with biogas capture.

description: Missing
units_description: Minimum target fraction of septic tanks under full compliance.

description: Missing
units_description: Target minimal fractional mix of wastewater treatment pathways at industrial facilities. Can specify any target pathway.

description: Missing
units_description: Target minimal fractional mix of wastewater treatment pathways in rural areas. Can specify any target pathway.

description: Missing
units_description: Target minimal fractional mix of wastewater treatment pathways in urban areas. Can specify any target pathway.

description: Reduce the amount of food waste generated per capita
units_description: Fractional reduction in per capita food waste generated relative to final time period

description: Increase the fraction of yard, food, and sludge waste that is treated by anaerobic digesters or compost
units_description: Fractional targets of organic waste treated via composting and anaerobic digesters. Can specify different fractions.

description: Increase fraction of biogas captured from landfills and anaerobic digesters
units_description: Minimum target fraction of anaerobic solid waste disposal facilties (landfills and digesters) with biogas capture.

description: Increase the fraction of biogas that is collected that is used for energy
units_description: Target minmum fraction of captured biogas that is used for energy production.

description: Missing
units_description: Target minmum fraction of waste that is incinerated for energy.

description: Increase fraction of waste that is otherwise untreated (i.e., post recycling, composting, etc.) that is sent to landfills
units_description: Target fraction of waste **that is not otherwise recycled (including composting for organics)** that is sent to landfills.

description: Missing
units_description: Target fraction of waste that is recycled (organic and yard waste are composted).

description: Increase Direct Air Capture deployment to 50 MT CO2e by final time period.
units_description: Exogenous specification of installed capacity of direct air capture facilities in variable units.

description: Increase OR Decrease exports of fuels
units_description: Fractional increase (+) or decrease (-) in exports relative to final time period.

description: Decrease transmission losses by upgrading electrical transmission infrastructure.
units_description: Target maximum fraction of electricity transmitted that is lost through inefficient or insufficient electricity infrastructure.

description: Missing
units_description: Implement the least cost NEMO solution without renewable targets.

description: Set a target for clean hydrogen production.
units_description: Fraction of hydrogen coming from electrolysis.

transformer: ENTC: 95% of electricity is generated by renewables in final time period
description: Set a target for renewable electricity. Includes minimum targets for specific renewable energy technologies.
units_description: Implement a target production share from renewables (renewable technologies are specified in input file). Additinoally, can implement minimum shares from specific technology.

description: Missing
units_description: Fractional reduction in CO2, CH4, and N2O leaks from fugitive emissions.

description: Missing
units_description: Fraction of otherwise vented gas that is flared instead.

description: Missing
units_description: Fractional improvement in average industrial technology efficiency.

description: Missing
units_description: Fractional improvement in production (e.g., kj/tonne) efficiency.

transformer: INEN: Fuel switch high- and low-temp thermal processes
description: Transformations for both (and/or) low and high-heat should be implemented using this transformer.
units_description: This transformation can be specified to shift 90% of both low (to electricity) and high (depending on industry) heat (to electricity and hydrogen).

transformer: SCOE: Reduce end-use demand for heat energy by improving building shell
description: Missing
units_description: Fractional change in heat demand in buildings.

description: Missing
units_description: Fractional increase in the efficiency of electrical appliances in buildings (residential and commercial/municipal).

description: Missing
units_description: Fractional increase in the efficiency of heat delivery technologies in buildings (residential and commercial/municipal). Non-electric efficiencies are capped at 1.

transformer: SCOE: Switch to electricity for heat using heat pumps, electric stoves, etc.
description: Missing
units_description: Fraction of heat energy switched to electricity.

description: Missing
units_description: Fractional reduction in aggregate transportation demand by TRDE demand type (e.g., public_private, regional, or freight)

transformer: TRNS: Increase electric transportation energy efficiency
description: Missing
units_description: Fractional increase in electric vehicle efficiency against the final time period.

transformer: TRNS: Increase non-electric transportation energy efficiency
description: Missing
units_description: Fractional increase in non-electric vehicle efficiency against the final time period

transformer: TRNS: Increase occupancy for private vehicles
description: Missing
units_description: Fractional increase in the average occupancy rate of private vehicles.

transformer: TRNS: Electrify light duty road transport
description: Missing
units_description: Minimum target fraction of light duty vehicles fueled by electricity. Can be used to explore other fuel shifts through a dictionary.

description: Missing
units_description: Minimum target fraction of maritime transportation fueled by hydrogen. Can be used to explore other fuels, such as ammonia, through a dictionary.

transformer: TRNS: Fuel switch medium duty road transport
description: Missing
units_description: Minimum target fraction of medium duty transportation fueled by electricity. Can be used to explore other fuel shifts through a dictionary.

description: Missing
units_description: Minimum target fraction of rail fueled by electricity. Can be used to explore other fuel shifts through a dictionary.

description: Missing
units_description: Fraction of freight demand shifted from aviation and road transport to rail. Additional mode shifts can be explored through a dictionary.

transformer: TRNS: Mode shift passenger vehicles to others
description: Missing
units_description: Fraction of passenger demand shifted from light-duty road PKMT to other forms (default is human powered and light-weight mobility). Additional mode shifts can be explored through a dictionary.

transformer: TRNS: Mode shift regional passenger travel
description: Missing
units_description: Fraction of regional passenger demand shifted from light-duty road and aviation PKMT to heavy-duty road.

description: Reduces use of clinker in cement production
units_description: Fractional reduction in clinker use in cement production.

description: Missing
units_description: Fractional reduction in production demand. NOTE: This transformer is not commonly used.

description: Missing
units_description: Fractional reduction in HFC emission factors per production quantity.

description: Missing
units_description: Fractional reduction in N2O emission factors per production quantity.

description: Includes SF6, NF3, HCFCs, and others
units_description: Fractional reduction in other FCs emission factors per production quantity.

description: Missing
units_description: Fractional reduction in PFC emission factors per production quantity.

description: Includes a reduction in the demand for red meat and allows for changes to different crop demands.
units_description: Fractional target maximum fraction of per-capita demand for red meat (cattle).

transformer: PFLO: Industrial carbon capture and sequestration
description: Implements carbon capture at industrial facilities, affecting both INEN and IPPU emissions. Specify a minimum target fraction of industrial facilities using carbon capture (prevalence) and target effectiveness of carbon capture at those faciltiies.
units_description: Minimum target fraction of industrial facilities using carbon capture (prevalence) and target effectiveness of carbon capture at those faciltiies.
